wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Johnson is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Leigh (Heritage № 929), and Swinton, as a goal-kicking fullback, i.e. number 1.
